library(rvest)
library(dplyr)
library(polite)
library("tidyverse")

url <- "https://www.amazon.co.uk/s?k=shoes&crid=2MZKVD0JA6ZPB&sprefix=shoes%2Caps%2C283&ref=nb_sb_noss_1"

session <- bow(url, user_agent = "For Educational Purposes")


amazon <- read_html(url)


shoes <- scrape(session) %>%
html_nodes("span.a-text-normal") %>%
html_text
shoes

shoes_price <- scrape(session) %>%
html_nodes("span.a-price-whole") %>%
html_text
shoes_price

shoes_ratings <- scrape(session)%>%
html_nodes ("i.a-icon.a-icon-star-small.a-star-small-4-5.aok-align-bottom") %>%
html_text
shoes_ratings

shoes_reviews <- scrape(session)%>%
html_nodes("span.a-size-base.s-underline-text")%>%
html_text
shoes_reviews
